articles.content: In the past two years, the average property in Nottingham has increased in value by a quarter. It is one of a constellation of cities across the Midlands whose property markets have been soaring, buc… [+1628 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk and brother under investigation for alleged insider trading - The Guardian
articles.description: Kimbal Musk sold Tesla shares the day before his brother asked Twitter if he should sell
articles.content:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission has reportedly opened an investigation into whether recent stock sales by Tesla CEO Elon Musk and his brother Kimbal Musk violated insider trading rules.
